The flag for each band indicates if the measurement was from: (0) $1\sigma $ isophotal aperture of semimajor axis "Radius," axis ratio, and position angle, or (10) the total flux combining the isophotal with the radial SB extrapolation, or (1) the point-source measurement from the ALLWISE catalog.
